\begin{figure}[h]  
\epsfxsize=7cm
%\epsfysize=2.5cm
\centerline{\epsfbox{lstm.eps}}
 \caption{The vacuum manifold in the simplest model
with twisted mass and superpotential, see (\ref{Aone}).
The target space is $S_2$ with the punctured  poles
(the poles are marked by closed circles).  The vacuum manifold consists
of two disconnected $S_1$ submanifolds. The trajectory running along a meridian
and interpolating between vacua belonging to the
first and second $S_1$ respectively 
(thick solid line) is a 1/4 BPS
saturated kink.}
\label{lstwmspfig} 
\
